name: Incline Hammer Curls
instructions: Seat yourself on an incline bench with a dumbbell.

name: Wide-grip barbell Curl
instructions: Stand up with your torso upright while holding.

name: Ez-bar Spider Curl
instructions: Seat yourself on an incline bench with a dumbbell.

name: 90/90 Hamstring
instructions: Lie on your back, with one leg extended straight out.

name: Ab Crunch Machine
instructions: elect a light resistance and sit down on the ab machine placing your feet under the pads provided.
